data: Based on the statement, "People act as if they think you are not smart." Response options were, "Almost everyday; At least once a week; A few times a month; A few times a year; Less than once a year; Never".

Based on the statement, "People act as if they think you are not smart." Response options were, "Almost everyday; At least once a week; A few times a month; A few times a year; Less than once a year; Never".
